# **Welcome to *Technical Margins***

This blog was born from my experience in technical writing and my desire to diversify my approach, exploring broader perspectives on the profession. Through *Technical Margins*, I share reflections on documentation engineering, user experience, and creativity in the workplace. While these topics may sometimes fall on the "margins" of central concerns, they are essential to enriching our approach to documentation and user support.

For me, this blog is a way to keep a varied skill set, allowing me to practise a more reflective style of writing that complements strict technical documentation. By finding inspiration in writing and other creative practices, I aim to keep a renewed sense of engagement that fuels my daily work.

![Growing plants](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/09c917d0-f5ca-4b29-a706-5e3ed5489e13/digqx4w-0257921f-3c52-4d33-a377-ef0f8f222901.jpg/v1/fill/w_900,h_783,q_75,strp/pots_doodles_by_li__lon_digqx4w-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Rlra3xNqZUcDyPkpf2geNTZuBRor2-7Flrdj9pCT0gk)

Enjoy reading, and feel free to share your thoughts on these themes.
